main_features.name: Web Scraping
main_features.description: Automated scraping of EU funding opportunities from specified URLs.

main_features.name: Database Management
main_features.description: Administration and management of a PostgreSQL database to store scraped data.

main_features.name: API Endpoints
main_features.description: RESTful API providing endpoints for accessing, creating, updating, and deleting tasks.

main_features.name: Dashboard
main_features.description: Interactive dashboard displaying system status, scraping statistics, and recent tenders.

technical_stack.description: Database management system for storing scraped data and application state.
Containerization of services for development, testing, and production environments.

technical_stack.purpose: HTML and XML parser for web scraping

corrective_actions.issue: SAWarning: This declarative base already contains a class with the same class name and module name as app.models.Task, and will be replaced in the string-lookup table.
corrective_actions.solution: Rename the class to avoid conflicts.
